channel.title: Decentralized on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Decentralized on Arrans github.io

item.title: mudler/LocalAI
item.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more. Features: Generate Text, MCP, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P and decentralized inference

item.title: Chocobozzz/PeerTube
item.description: ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser

item.title: mikeroyal/Self-Hosting-Guide
item.description: Self-Hosting Guide. Learn all about locally hosting (on premises & private web servers) and managing software applications by yourself or your organization. Including Cloud, LLMs, WireGuard, Automation, Home Assistant, and Networking.

item.title: owncast/owncast
item.description: Take control over your live stream video by running it yourself. Streaming + chat out of the box.

item.title: dokieli/dokieli
item.description: 💡 dokieli is a clientside editor for decentralised article publishing, annotations and social interactions

item.title: hackthedev/dcts-shipping
item.description: A Chat Platform like Discord but self-hostable like TeamSpeak

item.title: sandstorm-io/sandstorm
item.description: Sandstorm is a self-hostable web productivity suite. It’s implemented as a security-hardened web app package manager. | Actively sponsored by our friends at LambdaTest

item.title: pablo-chacon/dede-protocol
item.description: DeDe Protocol, Neutral, Trustless Settlement Rails for P2P Crowdshipping
